subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brad Lidge’s high-octane fastballs and wickedly deceptive slider have closed games for the Phillies, who host the Dodgers in Game 1 of the N.L.C.S.
snippet: Brad Lidge’s high-octane fastballs and wickedly deceptive slider have closed games for the Phillies, who host the Dodgers in Game 1 of the N.L.C.S.
